summary: The Prevent Halting of Active Research Act of 2025 (PHARA Act of 2025) aims to protect National Institutes of Health (NIH) grant funding and ongoing research. The bill mandates the immediate release of funds, payment of pending reimbursements, and prohibits the cancellation of agreements for active research. It requires termination clauses in future NIH agreements, specifying grounds for termination and notice requirements. Furthermore, it prohibits termination based on changing program goals or agency priorities, and mandates regulatory revisions to align with this provision.
